tool.name: Amino Acid Analysis
tool.description: Calculate amino acid percentages and counts in protein sequences

param.name: input
param.label: Input FASTA file
param.help: Input protein sequences in FASTA format

tool.help:
This tool analyzes the amino acid composition of each protein in a FASTA file.
For each protein sequence, it calculates: - The total sequence length - The percentage of each amino acid - The count of each amino acid
The output is in tab-delimited format.
